text:
Two similar trends we're seeing right now: consumers using Clawdbot to harness an agent running wild on their Mac mini, and teams trying to build their own internal fleet of coding agents, inspired by Ramp's recent post.

We're finally getting to the point where the value of
I honestly don't see why everyone is going crazy for a tool which is literally not even impressive compared to where AI is in terms of capabilities Clawdbot is a joke
Clawdbot, el asistente personal que ha convertido a un desarrollador austriaco en la estrella viral de la IA
